column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4757_b4a72a75b4795dffbe973b0ae287343df2dac13c/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
Can we not hard-code /home/jgarzik (can we default to $HOME/.bitcoin/blocks or so?)\n
Can we keep this consistent with hashlist.txt?\n
